Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/6/1978, off Gene Thor (CBC)...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 4/8/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1981, hitting .529 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Bay City to Plum Grove on 7/7/1982 (Going to BC: P R. Orme. Going to PG: LF P. Stowell, P C. Romig)...
Drove in 6 runs against New Jersey on 7/21/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/1/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1985, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 8/21/1985 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 5/19/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1986, hitting .529 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/2/1987...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Manchester on 4/30/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/16/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $4,098,600 per year...
